Introduction
This topic contains information on working with existing BIRLS records and Veteran NOD processing, including
Veteran NOD processing steps to include working with the MONTH OF DEATH and PRESIDENTIAL MEMORIAL CERTIFICATE screens
modifying existing dependent spouse of record on MONTH OF DEATH screen
identifying MOD cases paid by batch
amending the COMPENSATION AND PENSION DEATH (CPD) SPOUSE tab created by the automated MOD process
reviewing the ALL AWARDS page for MOD payments
granting entitlement to MOD payment only
when to refer an MOD memorandum to adjudication
denying entitlement to MOD
when the system finds multiple records during the NOD processing
folder establishment during the Veteran NOD processing
disposition of Veteran NOD data prints
, and
assigning new file numbers during the Veteran NOD processing
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B  - System Information for Veteran Notice of Death (NOD) and Month of Death (MOD) Processing
citation: Part XI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
